channel.title: My First Attempts
channel.description:
Please don't laugh :) Ok, so here's my first attempts at PhotoShop. I would like some Constructive Criticism. Also if people could give me pointers. That'd be awesome :)
[IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/PhotoShop/CharizardSignaturecopy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/PhotoShop/AnimeSignaturePNG.png[/img] I didn't really know what to do with this one... I just placed the render there, blurred it and called it good lol.
[IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/PhotoShop/DBZSignaturePNG.png[/img]
So, like I said, I'd like some pointers, but could you please be "nice?" Is that too much to ask for? :)
Anyways, I'd just like to get better at this.

item.title: My First Attempts
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

See, I thought those look good, but apparentely not ;D

EDIT - I just don’t really know where to start without a Tutorial Guiding me.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Attempts
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

All I’m seeing you do is whore that tutorial, you should be practicing with the different tools and find what looks good.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Attempts
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

New one added.

Basically right now, I only know 1 way to make things

Read full topic

item.title: My First Attempts
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:3, topic:144575”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=198169.msg1765968#msg1765968 date=1190165474]
First one is okay but the render could blend better. The second one…no…just no, you didn’t do a bad job or anything it’s just the render is a piece of shit. Not bad for a first 7/10

Also I like the tutorial you used on the first one
[/quote]

First ones a sprite JDB…[/quote]
My bad my mind was still thinking of the second one

Read full topic

item.title: My First Attempts
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Yeah well, when I put the Render on the second one I was like … But I thought I’d share it anyways cuz, it’s my first tries so.

Thanks for the reply

EDIT - Also, if anyone has some links to new Fonts, that’d be awesome. I only have like 20, and they’re all bad. I tried the links in the Sticky(Resources for PhotoShop) but the links don’t work for me.

Read full topic
